name: Double espresso
description: Rich and intense coffee made by forcing hot water through finely ground beans, delivering bold flavor and strong aroma.

name: Specialty espresso
description: Crafted with carefully selected beans and precise brewing, offering a smooth body, balanced flavor, and aromatic finish.

name: Caramel latte
description: Sweet and creamy blend of espresso, steamed milk, and rich caramel syrup, topped with a light foam.

name: Cappuccino
description: Smooth combination of espresso, steamed milk, and a thick layer of velvety foam, offering a balanced rich flavor.

name: Hot chocolate
description: Creamy and comforting drink made with steamed milk and rich chocolate, topped with a light froth or whipped cream.

name: White chocolate
description: Velvety and sweet drink made with steamed milk and smooth white chocolate, creating a creamy and indulgent flavor.

name: Pink chocolate
description: A creamy and sweet drink made with steamed milk and ruby (pink) chocolate, offering a fruity and smooth experience.

name: Nutella milk
description: Rich and creamy drink made with steamed milk and smooth Nutella, delivering a chocolatey-hazelnut experience

name: Ice matcha latte
description: Chilled and refreshing drink made with finely powdered green tea and milk, served over ice for a smooth and creamy texture.

name: Chai Latte
description: Warm and aromatic drink made with black tea, steamed milk, and a blend of spices, creating a comforting and creamy experience.

name: Chamomile
description: Soothing herbal infusion made from dried chamomile flowers, offering a gentle and calming experience.

name: Mocha
description: Rich and indulgent drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate, topped with a light froth.

name: Masalan tea
description: Refreshing and aromatic drink made by steeping selected tea leaves in hot water, offering a warm and soothing experience.

name: Turkish cofee
description: Strong and aromatic coffee made by slowly brewing finely ground coffee with water (and optionally sugar) in a cezve.

name: Spirulina
description: Nutritious and vibrant green drink made with spirulina powder and milk or water, served chilled for a smooth and refreshing experience.

name: Iced american
description: Chilled and smooth coffee made by pouring espresso over ice and adding cold water, delivering a refreshing and bold experience.

name: Iced latte
description: Chilled and creamy drink made with espresso and cold milk poured over ice, creating a smooth and refreshing experience.

name: Strawberry frappe
description: Sweet and icy blended drink made with strawberries, milk, and ice, topped with a light froth or whipped cream.

name: Green Tea
description: Refreshing and soothing drink made by steeping high-quality green tea leaves in hot water, offering a light and calming experience.

name: Blue white
description: Creamy and visually striking drink made with a blend of blue butterfly pea flower and milk, served chilled for a smooth and refreshing experience.

name: Coffee frappe
description: Icy and creamy blended drink made with coffee, milk, and ice, topped with a light froth or whipped cream.

name: Earl Grey
description: Aromatic and classic black tea infused with bergamot, served hot for a soothing and elegant experience.

name: Croissant
description: Buttery and flaky pastry with a light, airy texture, perfect for a breakfast treat or snack.

name: Classic waffle
description: Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, this golden waffle is perfect for breakfast or a sweet treat, served with optional toppings.

name: Ice cream waffle
description: Crispy waffle topped with creamy ice cream and your choice of sweet toppings, creating a delightful dessert experience.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Soft and moist muffin packed with fresh blueberries, offering a sweet and tender treat.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Chewy and buttery cookie loaded with rich chocolate chips, perfect for a sweet snack.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Soft and fluffy pastry swirled with cinnamon and sugar, often topped with a sweet glaze.

name: Fruit plate
description: Fresh assortment of seasonal fruits, carefully sliced and served for a light and refreshing treat.

name: Kunafa
description: Sweet and rich Middle Eastern dessert made with shredded pastry, layered with cheese or cream, and soaked in fragrant syrup.

name: Kunafa ice cream
description: Creamy ice cream served with shredded pastry and sweet syrup, combining the classic flavors of kunafa in a chilled dessert.

name: Ice cream cake
description: Layered dessert combining creamy ice cream and cake, often topped with chocolate, fruits, or whipped cream.

name: Chocolate cake
description: Moist and rich chocolate cake layered with smooth chocolate frosting, perfect for a decadent dessert.

name: Iranian breakfast
description: Traditional Iranian breakfast featuring a variety of fresh bread, cheeses, herbs, eggs, and jams, served with tea.

name: Sausage breakfast
description: Hearty breakfast plate with savory sausages, eggs, toast, and optional sides like tomatoes or hash browns.

name: Pomodora
description: Classic breakfast dish with scrambled or fried eggs, sautéed tomatoes, and herbs, served with bread.

name: American breakfast
description: Hearty breakfast platter including eggs, bacon or sausage, toast or pancakes, and optional sides like hash browns.

name: English breakfast
description: Traditional English breakfast featuring eggs, sausages, bacon, baked beans, grilled tomatoes, mushrooms, and toast.

name: Meat lovers
description: Hearty breakfast plate loaded with various meats like bacon, sausages, and ham, served with eggs and toast.

name: Boricuas
description: Puerto Rican-inspired breakfast featuring seasoned meats, eggs, plantains, and rice or bread.

name: Guacamole omelette
description: Fluffy omelette filled with creamy guacamole, served with toast or a side of fresh vegetables.

name: French test
description: Light and fluffy French toast made with bread soaked in a sweet egg mixture, often topped with syrup or powdered sugar.

name: Breakfast chilaquiles
description: Traditional Mexican breakfast dish with crispy tortilla chips, scrambled eggs, cheese, salsa, and optional toppings like avocado or sour cream.

name: Shredded kebab
description: Tender and juicy shredded meat kebab, seasoned and grilled to perfection, served with rice or bread.

name: Grilled chicken
description: Chenjeh has a very pleasant taste and is a favorite of many people.

name: Rice
description: Steamed and fluffy white rice, perfect as a side to complement any main dish.

name: Grilled chicken breast
description: Lean and tender grilled chicken breast, seasoned with herbs and spices, served with a side of vegetables or rice.

name: Sour Chicken
description: Tender chicken cooked in a tangy and savory sauce, served with rice or bread.

name: Classic hamburger
description: Juicy beef patty served in a soft bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, with optional cheese or sauces.

name: Hot Dog
description: Grilled sausage served in a soft bun with ketchup, mustard, and optional toppings like onions or relish.

name: Classic fries
description: Crispy and golden potato fries, lightly salted and served as a perfect side or snack.

name: Beef fries
description: Crispy golden fries topped with seasoned beef, melted cheese, and optional sauces for a hearty treat.

name: Roast beef panini
description: Toasted panini filled with tender roast beef, melted cheese, and fresh vegetables, served warm and crispy.

name: Breaded fillet plate
description: Crispy breaded fish fillet served with rice, fries, or vegetables for a hearty and delicious meal.

name: Steak
description: Juicy and tender steak grilled to perfection, seasoned with herbs and spices, served with your choice of sides.

name: Vegetable pizza
description: Oven-baked pizza topped with fresh vegetables, melted cheese, and savory tomato sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Meat and mushroom pizza
description: Oven-baked pizza topped with savory meat, fresh mushrooms, melted cheese, and rich tomato sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Chicken Pesto Pizza
description: Oven-baked pizza topped with tender chicken, creamy pesto sauce, melted cheese, and fresh herbs on a crispy crust.

name: Pepperoni pizza
description: Oven-baked pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices, melted cheese, and rich tomato sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Margherita pizza
description: Classic oven-baked pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil on a crispy golden crust.

name: Garlic Steak Pizza
description: Oven-baked pizza topped with tender steak slices, garlic, melted cheese, and fresh herbs on a crispy crust.

name: Pot Roast Pizza
description: Oven-baked pizza topped with tender pot roast, melted cheese, and savory tomato sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, creamy béchamel, and melted cheese, baked to golden perfection.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish with tender chicken, rich Alfredo sauce, and Parmesan cheese, served hot.

name: Beef Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish with tender beef, rich Alfredo sauce, and Parmesan cheese, served hot.

name: Chicken Pesto
description: Pasta tossed with tender chicken, creamy pesto sauce, and fresh herbs, served hot for a flavorful meal.

name: Soup
description: Warm and comforting soup made with fresh ingredients, herbs, and spices, perfect as a starter or light meal.

name: Salad
description: Fresh and crisp salad made with seasonal vegetables, tossed with a light dressing for a healthy and refreshing dish.
